title: mod怎么安装
author: cyf990606
txt_content: 还不会安装mod，求解怎么安装mod

replies.author: cyf990606
replies.txt_content: 求解求解求解求解求解求解

replies.author: Chaos丶越
replies.txt_content: 有了forge后 将mod拖入mods文件夹里

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 这个要分类讨论，普通mod拖入mods文件夹，flan系列拖入flan文件夹

replies.author: QQ360491894
replies.txt_content: 解压到MODS文件夹里，有些不需要解压的直接拉到MODS

replies.author: 0飞猪二代0
replies.txt_content: 安装FORGE然后把MOD拖到MODS文件夹里面
